The Messages interface is used to retrieve all the locale specific text. The default implementation uses Java [http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/api/java/util/ResourceBundle.html resource bundles].

To set up the resource bundle specify a context-param in your /WEB-INF/web.xml file and place the bundle wherever you want to like this. Note: pay attention to the fact that there is no forward slash and no ending .properties syntax. Both should be excluded.

{{{
<context-param>
  <param-name>jmesaMessagesLocation</param-name>
  <param-value>org/jmesaweb/resource/jmesaResourceBundle</param-value>
</context-param>
}}}
